description: This replacement brake pad insert is thicker than the standard Dura type, so it lasts longer. It has a 7.65mm contact width for narrow rims and cut outs for reduced weight. Designed for riding in dry conditions, but good in all types of weather.Compatible with any cartridge-based road-brake pad shoes.Water grooves push rain off of rims.
name: Kool-Stop Dura 2 Road Brake Pad Insert
